title: Florist Little Boss - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Childcare   Cooking   Cute Children   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Genius Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Mpreg
author: Bai Zhi Dian Mo   Ink Drop In White Paper   白纸点墨
description:
His name is Gao Yang (高阳), not a lamb (羔羊: gāo yáng), okay! If a gentle sheep gets upset, it will bite. Believe it or not!

Gao Yang a sheep in wolf's clothes: Don't come again! Otherwise, I will be rude!
Qin Shaoyan: Oh? Why not?
Gao Yang: I... I... won't cook for you!
Qin Shaoyan: It doesn't matter, just eat you.
Gao Xun: What if Dad dies after being eaten by Father? Waiting online, urgent!>
